status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5olaa","text":"Clone gene of interest into pcDNA5/FRT/TO. For VPS13C^mClover the In-Fusion system (Takara Catalog # 638947) was used. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3eqj","text":"Thaw and culture Flp-In™ T-REx™ 293 cells according to Gibco manual (Catalog # R780-07) in a 10cm dish. Once cells are 90% Confluent, split.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mt9m","text":"Freeze some cells according to Gibco manual protocol for future use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f8mb","text":"Plate cells in 6 well format to ~30% confluence in media containing no antibiotics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"altp3","text":"The next day, transfect cells using Fugene HD and a ratio of 9:1 pOG44: pcDNA5/FRT/TO-VPS13C^mClover.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ug9v","text":"Add   Fugene HD to DNA mixture. Let sit  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e19ae","text":"Add Fugene/DNA mixture to cells in a dropwise fashion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2q62t","text":"At 24h post transfection, wash cells and add fresh post-transfection media containing Blasticidin (no Zeocin or Hygromycin).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2d8dj","text":"At 48h post-transfection, split cells and plate at \u003c25% confluence in selection medium containing Blasticidin and   Hygromycin B (no zeocin).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3451}}}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"74bs6","text":"Feed the cells with Hygromycin B selection medium every 3-4 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5k4si","text":"When foci become apparent, pool Foci and allow cells to expand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vu8u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hjo3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5bi13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":22}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7urkp","text":"In our experience, at   Hygromycin B, it may appear that no colonies remain viable, however after 1-2 weeks a small amount of colonies were observed in which the gene of interest was stably integrated. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":141}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"52q94","text":"If all cells are nonviable under these conditions, it may be necessary to reduce the concentration of Hygromycin B in the selection media to   and/or optimize transfection conditions. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1rvnr","text":"Per manufacturers protocol, these surviving foci should be isogenic for the inserted gene.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3451},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3451},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6vf28","text":"Pooled cells can then be split, frozen, and/or used for experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transfection and selection of stably integrated cells

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ditia","text":"Plate cells at desired confluence in format appropriate for experiment in expression media containing  -  tetracycline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":102,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"879s2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo1p7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bere7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3451}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3451}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"89jib","text":"In our hands, we observed no difference in expression levels of VPS13C^mClover protein between 0.1 μg/ml and 1 μg/ml and thus we used the lower concentration, however the Gibco manual suggests using 1 μg/ml.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44ett","text":"After 24 hours, cells may be lysed for western blot or used for microscopy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
